column4: On the ubuntu livecd, how can a person get quickly to a console window?
I need to explain to someone over the phone, and I use kubuntu, not ubuntu
I guess so. But it's not a different OS
that's dangerous!
Kubuntu is the same thing as Ubuntu, only the desktop environment is KDE and not Gnome
the menus are different
once in the console, can she just "sudo su -" and be root without a password?
she wants to know how to partition and format an old PC...
how old?
yea.. that one works on all linuces..
and arand: I am just booting ubuntu on a virtualbox image...
I understand nothing of what u try to do
GL
I just rememberd I had virtualbox installed and the ISO downloaded, so it just occurred to me that I could test it out myself real quick..
what do u want to do precisely?
just give email isntructions on how she can partition and format some hard drives from a livecd
I got it now..
what for?
She's a psychyatris.. wants to give away her old computers but needs to wipe them of confidential data, first..
how old?
how much RAM?
not sure how much ram.. I am not there looking at them
u should
old pc do not support Ubuntu quite often
